column4: i have 3 computers on network, ubuntu,xp,win7, now i can go to xp and see the files but when i go on win7 i go to the folders and it dose not show anything, any ideas?
I have an idea, but it's not a great one. You could set up a LAN-website for file sharing (like do a LAMP stack and create a crummy webpage for listing all the stuff)
now that is pretty interesting, not sure what the problem could be then
